Name: Team Banzai
Details: Established 3015. Team Banzai is an enigmatic mercenary regiment that is known for the scientific genius of its commander, Dr. B Banzai. Team Banzai has been under contract to the Federated Suns throughout its existence and while not on deployment many of its members teach advanced courses at the New Avalon Institute of Science. Their contributions to technology are varied, including cooling suits for MechWarriors and - most famously - the Hatchetman BattleMech.
